testcase.name: Assign User to Contract BPKB
testcase.system-out: Given Go to IST.............................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success..........................................................passed And Select Arrow Menu "Contract Dispatcher Admin"...........................passed And Select Menu "Management Assignment".....................................passed And Select Username "mobile.test" of Management Assignment..................passed And Check for username if already assigned to "BPKB"........................passed And Wait page for load......................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Select Contract Dispatcher Menu based on type contract BPKB
testcase.system-out: Given Go to IST.............................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success..........................................................passed And Select Menu "Contract Dispatcher".......................................passed And Select Contract Number based on Type Contract "BPKB"....................passed And Click button "Claim"....................................................passed And Varify the mistake detail already match with the matrix Base on Type Contract.passed And Checkbox General Mistake "01. BPKB bagian depan tidak ada"..............passed And Choose Dropdown mistake type "Dokumen diunggah tidak ada" from mistake name "01. BPKB bagian depan tidak ada".passed And Type on textarea note before based on mistake name "01. BPKB bagian depan tidak ada" with value "TESTING".passed And Click button "Save".....................................................passed And Get text from pop up "IT Supporting Tools" with text "Mistake has been saved".passed And Click button "OK".......................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
